cellTextColor.fieldDescription: Color of the table cell text will be applied as per Abbott Standard color specifications
cellTextColor.name: ./cellTextColor

applyCellTextColorToEntireRow.fieldDescription: Text color of the entire row will be changed to the current cell text color.
applyCellTextColorToEntireRow.name: ./applyCellTextColorToEntireRow
applyCellTextColorToEntireRow.text: Apply cell text color to entire row?

applyCellTextColorToEntireColumn.fieldDescription: Text color of the entire column will be changed to the current cell text color.
applyCellTextColorToEntireColumn.name: ./applyCellTextColorToEntireColumn
applyCellTextColorToEntireColumn.text: Apply cell text color to entire column?

tableCellHeader.fieldDescription: Check if the current table cell is to be treated as a header.
tableCellHeader.name: ./tableCellHeader

applyCellHeaderToEntireRow.fieldDescription: If selected then all the cells in the entire row will be treated as table header.
applyCellHeaderToEntireRow.name: ./applyCellHeaderToEntireRow
applyCellHeaderToEntireRow.text: Apply cell header to entire row?

applyCellHeaderToEntireColumn.fieldDescription: If selected then all the cells in the entire column will be treated as table header.
applyCellHeaderToEntireColumn.name: ./applyCellHeaderToEntireColumn
applyCellHeaderToEntireColumn.text: Apply cell header to entire column?

cellColor.fieldDescription: Color of the cell will be applied as per Abbott Standard color specifications
cellColor.name: ./cellColor

applyCellColorToEntireRow.fieldDescription: Background color of the entire row will be changed to the current cell color.
applyCellColorToEntireRow.name: ./applyCellColorToEntireRow
applyCellColorToEntireRow.text: Apply cell color to entire row?

applyCellColorToEntireColumn.fieldDescription: Background color of the entire column will be changed to the current cell color.
applyCellColorToEntireColumn.name: ./applyCellColorToEntireColumn
applyCellColorToEntireColumn.text: Apply cell color to entire column?

textAlignment.fieldDescription: Text alignment of the table cell
textAlignment.name: ./textAlignment

applyTextAlignmentToEntireRow.fieldDescription: Text alignment of the entire row will be changed to the current cell color.
applyTextAlignmentToEntireRow.name: ./applyTextAlignmentToEntireRow
applyTextAlignmentToEntireRow.text: Apply text alignment to entire row?

applyTextAlignmentToEntireColumn.fieldDescription: Text alignment of the entire column will be changed to the current cell color.
applyTextAlignmentToEntireColumn.name: ./applyTextAlignmentToEntireColumn
applyTextAlignmentToEntireColumn.text: Apply text alignment to entire column?
